mapper.sql: d.id AS "id", d.name AS "name", d.sort AS "sort", d.code AS "code", d.zip_code AS "zipCode", d.address AS "address", d.phone AS "phone", d.fax AS "fax", d.email AS "email", d.useable AS useable, d.remarks AS "remarks", d.create_by AS "createBy.id", d.create_time AS "createTime", d.update_by AS "updateBy.id", d.update_time AS "updateTime", d.del_status AS "delStatus", d.master_id AS "master.id", d.area_id AS "area.id", d.parent_id AS "parent.id" p.name AS "parent.name", a.name AS "area.name", u.name AS "master.name"
FROM sys_department d LEFT JOIN sys_department p ON p.id = d.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_area a ON a.id = d.area_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = d.master
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_department( id, name, sort, code, zip_code, address, phone, fax, email, master_id, useable, remarks, grade, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_status, parent_id, area_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{code}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{master.id}, #{useable}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{delStatus}, #{parent.id}, #{area.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_department SET name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, code = #{code}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, master_id = #{master.id}, useable=#{useable}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_time = #{updateTime}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, area_id = #{area.id} WHERE id = #{id}
